Skills: Skill Set: Business and Data Analysis

Experience using data with advanced analytics, business intelligence, data warehouse applications, and big data analytics.
A strong understand of Data Governance and the experience and ability to assist clients implement data governance polices and capabilities
Familiarity with both traditional and agile IT project delivery and development cycles
Excellent written and oral English, with experience preparing and managing documentation of senior level client deliverables
Requirements documentation techniques; Epics, User Stories, Use Cases, Functional, Non-functional.
Experience in prototyping techniques.
Experience using diagramming techniques to visualise data flows, current and future state process diagrams.
Industry experience from one or more core industries (finance, insurance, retail, government)
Experience or knowledge of testing methodologies and supporting business users with UAT testing.
